New Records: Virat Kohli recorded his first international hundred in nearly three years
Bhuvneshwar Kumar bowled one of the best spells in Twenty20 cricket by grabbing 5-4 with his brilliant swing bowling upfront
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli hit a blistering unbeaten 122 off just 61 balls
Bhuvneshwar Kumar's superb bowling with the new ball led to the dismissal of Afghanistan's batting lineup
KL Rahul and Virat Kohli provided India a rollicking start of 119 runs off 76 balls
Pre-Game Insights: India couldn't make it to the final after losing to Sunday's finalists Pakistan and Sri Lanka
Afghanistan, which won its group games against Sri Lanka and Bangladesh, faltered in the Super 4 stage
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli dedicated his century to his wife Anushka Sharma and their daughter Vamika
Kohli said he was refreshed after a six-week break and realized how tired he was
Miscellaneous Highlights: India bowled out Afghanistan for 111-8 and gave India its second-biggest win ever in a T20 international
Afghanistan captain Mohammad Nabi conceded that his team wasn't mentally prepared for the match
